title: Youtube sucks
body:
Might go watch this link after I watch this other link!

:Le skip back with the backwards arrow:
:Le link is gone:
:Le Link never to be seen again:.
'\/(o.O)\/'


#fu youtube.

replies.body: Can you go back to the same video and the link will pop up again? You can also go to your viewed video history.

Nah it shows a list of recommended videos for you to watch and if you leave the page without opening the ones you want to watch - skipping back from the video you went forward to shows a different list and I forget to open the other ones or I spot one as I'm heading forwards to watch one and I go back and its gone :(

They don't show in history because they're just the recommended vids on front page.
